post:
**[RamNode](http://www.ramnode.com "**RamNode**") - High Performance SSD VPS Hosting**

High Performance RAID10 SSD and SSD-Cached VPSs

**New Plans! New Prices!**

**About Us**

Our VPSs are hosted in **New York City**, **Atlanta**, **Seattle**, and **The Netherlands**. Our US servers are located at Telehouse Chelsea (New York City), 55 Marietta (Atlanta) and The Westin (Seattle), where we own all of our hardware and network ([AS3842](http://bgp.he.net/AS3842 "AS3842")). We have partnered with a provider in the Dataplace data center in the Netherlands ([AS198203](http://bgp.he.net/AS198203)) to be able to offer our great plans in Europe as well.

RamNode offers **KVM** and **OpenVZ** VPSs. Please see below for more details.

=====================================

**VPS Features**

Each VPS comes with the following features:

* SolusVM control panel
* 1Gbps fair share port speed
* Free [DNS hosting](https://clientarea.ramnode.com/cart.php?gid=12 "DNS Hosting")
* INSTANT setup
* Optional **DDoS protection** for ALL locations

=====================================

* 12GB RAID10 SSD Space

**Price**: **$15/yr**

=====================================

**FAQ**

**How long does VPS setup take?**
Your VPS will be setup **INSTANTLY** upon receipt of payment (unless we happen to be out of stock). KVM VPSs are available instantly, but you are responsible for installing the OS ([KVM Guide](https://clientarea.ramnode.com/knowledgebase.php?action=displayarticle&id=44 "KVM Guide")).

**How can I pay?**
We accept PayPal and Stripe.

**Do you have a money back guarantee?**
We have a 3 day money back guarantee on your first invoice of your first service as long as your account is in good standing.

**What's the best way to get help when I need it?**
Our VPSs are unmanaged, but you can open a ticket for acceptable support requests. We are also available on Live Chat, Skype, and IRC. 

**How fast is your network?**
Our VPS nodes are connected to the Internet at a minimum of 1Gbps. Your VPS can use all of that speed on a fair share basis.

**Do you have a looking glass?**
New York City:
	http://lg.nyc.ramnode.com
Atlanta:
	http://lg.atl.ramnode.com
Seattle:
	http://lg.sea.ramnode.com
The Netherlands:
	http://lg.nl.ramnode.com

**What's the difference between SSD and SSD-Cached?**
Our SSD VPSs are built with RAID10 arrays of pure SSD storage. They are some of the fastest on the market. Our SSD-cached VPSs store "hot" data (data frequently called on by the server) in a RAID10 array of SSDs. These VPSs come with lots of hard drive space, but still have similar performance to an all-SSD VPS.

**What operating systems are available?**
We offer a [variety](https://clientarea.ramnode.com/knowledgebase.php?action=displayarticle&id=48 "variety") of 32 and 64-bit OS templates and ISOs.

**Do you offer cPanel?**
Yes, we are an **official cPanel NOC**. You can order a cPanel/WHM VPS license [here](https://clientarea.ramnode.com/cart.php?gid=12 "here").

**Do you offer DDoS protection?**
Yes, we offer DDoS filtering as an add-on. Please see this [article](url=https://clientarea.ramnode.com/knowledgebase.php?action=displayarticle&id=85 "article").

**Can I use my VPS for ___?**
Please see our [AUP](https://clientarea.ramnode.com/aup.php "AUP").

=====================================

**Contact Us**

There are a variety of ways you can contact us:
**Sales**: sales[at]ramnode.com
**Support**: support[at]ramnode.com
**Accounts**: accounts[at]ramnode.com
**Skype**: RamNode
**Twitter**: [RamNode](http://twitter.com/ramnode "RamNode")
**Facebook**: [RamNode](http://facebook.com/ramnode "RamNode")
**IRC**: #ramnode on irc.netchat.io - [WebChat](http://webchat.netchat.io/ramnode "WebChat")

You can also catch us on Live Chat or open up a ticket from the [Client Area](https://clientarea.ramnode.com "Client Area").
